Command.Name: CmdPaste
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste the contents of the Clipboard.

Command.Name: CmdCut
Command.TooltipDescription: Cut the selection from the document and put it on the Clipboard.

Command.Name: CmdCopy
Command.TooltipDescription: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard

Command.Name: CmdZoom100Percent
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document to 100% of the normal size.

Command.Name: CmdWordWrap
Command.TooltipDescription: Select word wrapping option to change how text appears on your screen. This does not affect how the document looks when you print it.

Command.Name: CmdSaveAs
Command.TooltipDescription: Save the document with a new name or format.

Command.Name: CmdHeaderSave
Command.LabelTitle: Save a copy of the document

Command.Name: CmdRDocument
Command.LabelDescription: Save the document in the R format.

Command.Name: CmdPrint
Command.LabelDescription: Select printer, number of copies and other printing options before printing.

Command.Name: CmdQuickPrint
Command.LabelDescription: Send the document directly to the default printer without making changes.

Command.Name: CmdPrintPreview
Command.LabelDescription: Preview and make changes to pages before printing.

Command.Name: CmdViewOnePage
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document so that an entire page fits in the window.

Command.Name: CmdViewTwoPages
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document so that two pages fit in the window.

Command.Name: CmdPreviousPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Navigate to the previous page of the document.

Command.Name: CmdNextPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Navigate to the next page in the document.

Command.Name: CmdClosePrintPreview
Command.TooltipDescription: Close print preview and return to editing the document.

Command.Name: CmdRSendFile
Command.TooltipDescription: Sends the entire file to R.

Command.Name: CmdRSendCursorToEndLine
Command.LabelTitle: Send content from cursor to end line to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendNavigator
Command.LabelTitle: Send selected navigator tree to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendLinesToEndPage
Command.LabelTitle: Send lines to end of the file to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendCurrentLineToTop
Command.LabelTitle: Send con&tent from current line to top to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendCursorToBeginningLine
Command.LabelTitle: Send content &from beggining line to the cursor to R

Command.Name: CmdFilesRemoveAllOfGroup
Command.LabelTitle: Remove all files from selected group
Command.LabelDescription: Remove all files from selected group
Command.TooltipTitle: Remove all files from selected group
